name: ReplaceInFilesBetweenText
description: Search for a string in the Source Files and replace the content between start and end.
author: Samayas

inputs.name: parameterSearchStart
inputs.label: Search Start of Text
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a string to search for in a line.

inputs.name: parameterSearchEnd
inputs.label: Search End of Text
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a string to search for at the end of the line after a successful Start Text.

inputs.name: parameterReplaceText
inputs.label: Replace Text
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the text to replace between the Start and the end.

inputs.name: parameterTypeOfSearch
inputs.label: Choose the Type of Search
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose between Search Pattern and List of Files.

inputs.name: parameterFilesPattern
inputs.label: Files Search Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a search pattern for looking for files ex. *.cs, MyFile.cs.

inputs.name: parameterFilesList
inputs.label: List of Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a list of files that wil be prepended by source Directory
